game.name: Super Switch
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Super Switch is a difficult platformer in which you have to actively switch between 2 dimensions. It's tougher than iron and extremely rewarding.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Super Switch is a difficult platformer in which you have to actively switch between 2 dimensions. It's tougher than iron and extremely rewarding.
